Text: CongratulationsJeff Congratulations on your promotion Im sure you already know how well everyone in the ranks is receiving the news You and Enron are truly amazing I really want to thank you again for helping me get involved It continues to be an exhilarating experience and it has meant a lot to me personally for a number of reasons If I can ever help you in any way just say the word Warmest personal regards Vince kai

Program funding Cc barely intelligible email contains the draft letter from Noxtechs President Ralph Slone We averted this crisis by advancing Noxtech against the expenses incurred on our behalf by Noxtech that are reimbursable under the License Agreement I spoke with Ralph Slone today by the way He thinks PBCC his lender will have comments back on the Warrant Agreement today I will keep you apprised Best regards Vince Forwarded by Vince MiddletonHOUECT on PM Ralph Slone on PM To Vince F Middleton cc Subject Program funding Vince cannot make its payroll for the end of the month October if it does not receive the advance to cover our expenses as described in attached letter I have not sent the letter to Mike or George I would prefer to resolve this problem between you and I If I havent received a definitive answer from you by Monday afternoon I will take that to mean no I will then send the letter to the Cc list Regards enronfunddoc
